text: Anata gata wa, nise shinja-tachi no koto de, doshite 2-ha ni wakareta no ka. Arra wa kare-ra no okonai no tame ni, kare-ra o (fushinjin ni) tenraku sa se raretade wanai ka. Anata gata wa, arra ga mayowa se rareta mono o michibikou to nozomu no ka. Hontoni arra ga mayowa se rareta mono ni wa, kesshite michi o miidasenaidearou
